notes.text:
This update for apache-commons-beanutils fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-10086: Added special BeanIntrospector class which allows suppressing the ability for an attacker to access the classloader via the class property available on all Java objects (bsc#1146657).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Apache Commons Beanutils 1.9.2, a special BeanIntrospector class was added which allows suppressing the ability for an attacker to access the classloader via the class property available on all Java objects. We, however were not using this by default characteristic of the PropertyUtilsBean.
notes.title: CVE description
